website_summaries.verdict: This lip treatment boasts high-quality, natural ingredients that work to leave lips soft and hydrated after every use.
pros: Natural ingredients are not harsh on lips or skin
Not sticky or oily, glides onto lips smoothly, and leaves them feeling moisturized and soft
Perfect for those with cracked lips or for anyone looking to maintain soft and supple lips
cons: May leave waxy residue after use

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious and leaves lips buttery smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Smells delectable! While much more gentle an exfoliator than other sugar based lip scrubs as it’s made up of natural honey crystals, it definitely does the job to smoothen and condition your lips. I wouldn’t recommend for significantly chapped lips, or if you like rough textured grains like sugar in your lip exfoliator. The reason I rate this product five stars is due to the silky smooth finish and incredibly delicious natural honey-sweet scent it leaves behind on the lips. It is so much more natural feeling and smelling than other lip scrubs I’ve tried. Well worth trying!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle L.

customer_reviews.title: Not even 5 minutes of moisture
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty bad chapped lips and started researching more about overnight treatments. I love Burt's Bees chapstick so I thought I'd give this ago. Although the initial application feels and smells great, it completely dried up within 5 minutes. There is no way this is considered an 'overnight treatment' - especially when it's needed the most in the dry air of winter. I do not recommend this device unless you're obsessed with frequent application...but ideally you should be asleep because it's overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Best lip balm ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many lip treatments, this is hands down the best ever. I apply in the morning and at night. These two applications are all I need. I had to apply and reapply the stuff I used before throughout the day. Worth every penny! Also, I am using a bit of honey and sugar to exfoliate my lips every couple days, these two treatments together are perfect for your pout ;)
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced.  They need to work on this.
customer_reviews.text: Didn,t work, wasted my money. My own concoction olive oil and sugar worked better.
customer_reviews.author: chatcher

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Caused allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had an allergic reaction to this product, which makes me wonder how “natural” it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for normal lips
customer_reviews.text: Listen, this may not be the product for you if you have desperately cracked lips. If that's the case, mix olive oil and brown sugar and go to town. I use this every night; my lips are overall softer and the actual product is high quality. I saw someone thinks its like pure honey? That is just not true. The scent is amazing and no it's not sticky like honey. It is very small, though I think it'll last awhile. Probably won't buy again just because the price is a little steep. I recommend Elf Scrub Stick, it's $3 and it's really gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Good lip product
customer_reviews.text: I usually can’t do any mint smells because they give me headaches easily. But this lip treatment doesn’t bother me. It has a light sweet mint smell and it smells really good and moisturizes my lips well. When I wake up in the morning my lips feel hydrated and it has fixed my cracked lips.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have about 1 million different lip products that I rotate around have them everywhere but as for my nighttime lip routine this one has been the best by far. I breathe through my mouth at night which without anything on them makes me wake up with very dry and cracked lips have tried so many different products and some of them are OK but nothing has been great this one really moisturizes my lips and I Wake up with some product still on them keeping them nice and moisturized and no more dry cracked lips
customer_reviews.author: Lori L. Thomka

customer_reviews.title: At risk of sounding like I'm paid by Burt's Bees...
customer_reviews.text: OMG, absolutely worth it. I used my lip scrub first, and then this overnight repair before bed, for the past 2 nights since buying it. I then use my regular Burt's lip balm during the day. The difference the overnight stuff makes is immediately noticeable after the first night and I can only imagine it's going to get better. I've never in my 30 years of life found a product that actually heals my lips in these western NY winters until this one. I even wake up and still feel it on my lips in morning, and I roll around and sleep on my face a lot. 100% reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Honest customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes your lips soft, not very user friendlt
customer_reviews.text: Oil makes your lips soft, but the sheet is all crumpled up in the pouch and I had a hard time getting it to stick to my lips. But the oil does work. I opted for the Burt’s bees overnight lip treatment Instead, which works better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, works great, worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in DEC2019 (you know, back when we were still optimistic about 2020?). It's now SEP2020. This little container lasted 9 months of almost nightly use. That's one dollar a month for glorious, soft, buttery lips that never dry out overnight. Highly recommend; I'm buying my second container today. :)
customer_reviews.author: Skidtz

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it doesn't do anything. I've use lip scrubs in the past where you rub them on your lips and then rinse them off and your lips suddenly feel softer. This is unlike that because it almost goes on like Vaseline or chapstick. It's greasy and hard to keep contained only to your lips. It does have chunks in it that are fine but it's hard to exfoliate because it's not really a smooth texture it's more tacky.
customer_reviews.author: BrittneyA

customer_reviews.title: Worst Lip Scrub
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product since I really love Burt's Bees BUT this is probably the worse lip scrub I have ever used. The smell is AWWWFUUUUUL and the product does nothing for my lips. If you're looking for a good lip scrub, try using a Jeffree Star lip scrub. They are great for taking off dead skin and hydrating your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was really good until I really put it to the winter test. It worked well when my lips weren't in dire need but when I needed chapped lip relief most, and when I really needed it to be a good overnight mask, it was not all that it cracked up to be and I was left disappointed. If you want something that works, use the intense relief from aquaphor, that fixed my lips OVERNIGHT and it's my saving grace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not exfoliate
customer_reviews.text: The consistency of this is of a thick lip balm. It has very few sugar bits in it - not enough to call this a scrub. It's very thick and does not come off easy. Too greasy. And for what you get, this should be a third of the cost. Too expensive for so little product that does not do what it is advertised to do.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth! My favorite lip balm
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is silky smooth and so nice to wear! It definitely doesn’t work AGAINST my lips, drying them out further like other products. However, I don’t know that I would say it’s “intensely” moisturizing. Definitely helps to prevent chronic dryness, but isn’t an instant cure for already dry lips. I still give it 5 stars because it’s my favorite lip balm of all time and I love wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nauck

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is out in cold, wintery elements going to and from class and practices every day of the week. She was complaining of very dry lips--so we tried this. Within a few nights use, it made a big difference. She uses it overnight or anytime she feels she needs extra moisturizing. Usually, she is fine using this at night and keeping the Burt's Bee's lip balm with her throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier Mom

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite lip balm
customer_reviews.text: I love love this lip balm. It was originally gifted to me as part of a hostess gift basket and I immediately purchased additional tubs to keep in my desk, purse, and vanity. It's not heavy and makes my lips instantly soft. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My lips get dry so fast, so I wanted to try something to help with that. This product really does help. I wake up with my lips feeling super moisturized and super soft. I put on some Burt’s bees lip oil every morning to maintain that softness throughout the day. Putting the night treatment does a lot on its own though.
customer_reviews.author: Julio & Nat

customer_reviews.title: Something I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I like how the Burts Bees lip scrub makes my lips feel after use, I can feel the soft-smooth surface of my lips. Even though it’s not a overnight lip balm I still scrub my lips some nights then put another layer on my lips to have the honey settle on them over night, then in the morning I wash it off. And it may be a small container, but it is one of those ‘ a little goes a long ways’, so it will last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best lip mask
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry sensitive skin and I love using the burts bees lip mask. They are so hard to find and when I do it’s $4 and up for one. Here it’s $12 for 6 so about $2 each which is a steal. I’ve been using the lip masks and they always help heal my lips, they aren’t too smelly and leave my lips very moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. It smells SO good and works even better. I use this three times a week and I saw a difference, in smoothness, within a week. I also purchased a lip scrubber, around $5 on Amazon, but I have used the product without the scrubber and the results were still awesome.
customer_reviews.author: BJF

customer_reviews.title: The Best Lip Treatment!!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used Burt's Bees product before, but I saw the review for this item on a website and tried it. This is the best lip treatment ever, great scent (like a candy!!), moisturize the lips quickly!! It feels like a scrub, but massage it on your lips with the finger, then it melts. 100% recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is possibly the worse thing I've ever purchased from Amazon!! It left my lips crinkly and not at all moisturized! If I could return it I would, but that is where they get you! Once you get it you can not return it! Awful, Awful, Awful!!! Do not suggest anyone purchasing this!
customer_reviews.author: ms brown

customer_reviews.title: The. Most. Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: MY FAVORITE LIP MASK EVER!!!!! I have to reorder soon, I’m running out. I’m generally not a burts bees fan but this stuff is a gift from god. Put it on right before you sleep after you’re done doing everything else and in the morning you wake up with beautiful, soft, plump lips
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product, my lips get so dry and at night just before I go to bed I put this on. They are not cracked or bleeding anymore. The product is extremely light and you don't have to use a lot of the lip care, a little goes a long way....
customer_reviews.author: Mary Keating

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t hate this balm. I don’t like it either. It is not very moisturizing...just balmy. I always put vaseline on top because my lips feel tight and sticky after i use it. I like the slightly tingly sensation but that’s about it. Doesn’t really do it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Angel K

customer_reviews.title: Dry lip remedy
customer_reviews.text: I love this scrub! It lasts FOREVER! I only need to use about 1x/wk and it saves my lips for the week. Occasionally the scrub gets in my mouth and when it does it doesn’t taste awful. Not much of a scent and the scent goes away after you wash it off. I leave it on for a few mins and the amount lasts for the year.
customer_reviews.author: Ephraim & Misty Schoephoerster

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting more
customer_reviews.text: I use Burt’s bees vanilla lip balm daily and so I thought I would try the overnight. I was not impressed. It’s didn’t leave my lips “overly moisturized” at all and if anything I think they felt more chapped. I was expecting more, but maybe it’s different for different people. Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectation
customer_reviews.text: 1. Very small 2. crystals do not stay on lips as you massage... they clump up... making it hard to massage them unto lips 3. vaseline like stickiness that resembles "moisturized lips" 4. has a "cheap makeup" smell... 5. don't know what it tastes like because its not for taste... it's a lip treatment Overall, I probably will finish it but because I don't want it to go to waste. Definitely won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest lip balm! I use it as just a regular lip balm and it does wear off fairly quick but my lips have not cracked since using it! It feels great and theres enough in there that I use it multiple times a day!
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: RUBBISH PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY NO SCRUB QUALITY ABOUT THIS. STRAIGHT IN THE BIN. WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Michael A

customer_reviews.title: OK but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Didn't find this as revolutionary as some make it out, but it's been OK. Lasts about as long as other lip salves - it's not waxy, which I appreciate, so makes a change from some of the thicker ones.
customer_reviews.author: ncstorace

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, not an effective lip exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for a good lip exfoliator. Lips aren't too bad, but this doesn't do the job. It doesn't last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: kdub

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t exactly what I was look for HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product to have soft lips, it taste good if you get it in your toungue, and also smells good. I was just looking for a more vigorous scrub because I seem to get dry dead skin on my lips often. All in all it’s a good product
customer_reviews.author: Tara Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Scrub.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The packaging was a little messed up but it didn’t affect the scrub. The honey crystals were much larger than I expected which made the scrub harder to stick to your lips and apply. Other than that the scrub had a wonderful smell only downside is the larger than expected honey crystals, which is on the package.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Great hydrating product!
customer_reviews.text: Very hydrating for your lips. My lips get dry, so I apply it and let it work over night. Also Great when you know you’re going to wear a matte lip color as well, I’ve put it on while I do my make up and wipe off just before putting the matte lipstick and it definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: This actually worked very decently on my dry, peeling lips & I've tried other sugar lip scrubs. I have lips that I can sit daily and people off in whole sheets during the winter. I use this, scrub my mouth, leave on whatever doesn't crystalize- and my lips are much better. I've recommended to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Piquant

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Won't purchase again. I'll just make my own. I love Burts Bees products, but not this one. Really small for price and jar wasn't even full. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA K.

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay, it’s very oily though and when I put it on at night, even if I’m careful not to apply a lot, the next morning my chin and area around my mouth are oily too.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Could have more crystals
customer_reviews.text: It’s really Moisturizing. I wish The crystals were larger or had more of them because when you apply it to your lips it melts like automatically so it’s not much scrubbing time. But you could maybe at in your own sugar crystals it will probably work better that way.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C

customer_reviews.title: Great lip treatment
customer_reviews.text: I could feel a difference after just one use. This is great for overnight treatment but also can be used during the day. Really helpful for dry, cracked lips!
customer_reviews.author: KReview

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a night balm forever. This one is ok. Not great. I won’t order again because there is better out there in the market. It’s “ok” for the price. But for a few extra bucks there is a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: NewJerseyJess

customer_reviews.title: It’s fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. I said, “Hey babe, Amazon wants me to rate the lip stuff I bought you. What do you think about it?” “Five stars.” “What about moisturizing, flavor and scent babe, it’s asking about that too?” ”Five stars! Everything about it is fantastic!” So there you go. Its fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this product, because what if it didn't work? I'm sooo happy that I did purchase this balm. I'm happy to report that it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Smilingreader

customer_reviews.title: Does not scrub or exfoliate
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t exfoliate at all! It just feels and smells like honey wax, which is nice and all, but I wasn’t looking for another lip moisturizer - I need strong exfoliation :(
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Smells like butter. I bought for my husband who hates doing lip balm. Seems to work really well. Give four stars because it is little pricy compared with other brands of lip mask in the market
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: The best Lip balm
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much. I will repurchase over and over. I love the velvety texture. It isn't too heavy to use as a daily Lip balm, which is how I use this. By far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Thin but coats very well.
customer_reviews.text: Has a slight mintiness, but it's not strong. When you put it on, it's pretty thin, but it costs your lips in a layer that doesn't come off as easily as normal lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler

customer_reviews.title: Lack of scrub
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried a few lip scrubs and this just doesn't cut it. It doesn't actually scrub. it feels more like a lip balm. Then you have to wipe off the extra scrub which then leads to wiping off the gloss part to it. Waste of money and its TINY
customer_reviews.author: Mark Olivas

customer_reviews.title: Works after the first use !
customer_reviews.text: After one use my lips feel more nourished! My lips have been quick dry, dark and dull lately, but this definitely alleviates some of those problems. I’m confident that after continuous use my lips will be back to normal
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: It is Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Nothing all that special and would not repurchase. Does not last on the lips as a nighttime treatment should. Better off with the regular Burts Bee's lip balms for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing not much exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for more of a gritty exfoliation scrub for my lips and this has very, very little. However it is very moisturizing and my lips feel amazingly soft after using it. I'm not too crazy about the smell and flavor but then again I didn't buy it for that. The feel is very soft with some exfoliation crystals in it. If you're looking for something gritty this isn't it but it is nice. Not exactly what I was looking for but I'm still happy about it
customer_reviews.author: Nia D

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Dosnt work. Just turns into a wax ball as your trying to rub it on your lips
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: pleasant but kind of thin
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely product. Nice feel and smell, but it's not goopy enough. I expect a night time little treatment to have some substance. Regular Burts Bees would be thicker than this.
customer_reviews.author: mamaknowsbest

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Burt’s Bees is a top of the line product if you ask me. The lip scrub is great! After using on my lips they were so soft. It took all the dead skin off and left my lips feeling super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy West

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Using this before I put on my lipstick is a life saver. Makes my lips smooth and moist for longer lasting lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Malibuchristi

customer_reviews.title: Really helped!
customer_reviews.text: Really helped with badly dried lips. No other moisturizer would help overnight and this one made it so they were healed by morning!
customer_reviews.author: YY@Minnieapolis

customer_reviews.title: THIS SAVES MY LIPS FROM WINTER!
customer_reviews.text: My lips always get severely chapped during the winter. Last year I started putting this on before bed and in the morning and it keeps my lips soft and moisturized! I don't even have to use any other lip balm during the day. Doesn't feel or smell too medicated.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice, and it didn't really work for me. I'll keep trying since I already bought it. If it still doesn't work, I'm going back to coconut oil and sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: The container is a little smaller than I imagined, so we'll see how long it lasts. But I love the smell/flavor, it's almost like a creme brulee burnt sugar smell. It makes my lips feel really good although it makes me want to eat it instead of wiping it off!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Effective, pleasant to use - and well priced!
customer_reviews.text: Have used a few different overnight lip treatments. This is the most effective and best priced.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Ross

customer_reviews.title: Makes my lips feel great!
customer_reviews.text: No flavor or scent but feels great on your lips. You do need to either glob it on before bed or reapply multiple times... but I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob N. G. D.

customer_reviews.title: its decent
customer_reviews.text: idk this does not have a flavor to me but i appreciate the moisturizing properties so its not bad
customer_reviews.author: Raisa

customer_reviews.title: Just get the chapstick
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work much better than the original chapstick, and it doesn't have the tingle. You're better off with just buying the chapstick. The tub is also tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Sadly dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don't think this product did anything. It was very difficult for it to stay on my lips because it was so big. Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela A

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip balm for overnight. Use a CPAP and my lips are always dry and cracked. Really helps!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Rhodus

customer_reviews.title: Love Burt’s Bees
customer_reviews.text: I love this as it keeps my lips moist. Even though it says overnight use I use it during the day as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is my first exfoliator so I dont really have anything to compare it to but its cool, I put it on before showers then scrub my lips after to remove any dead skin that builds up. Works well but it's a little clumpy for some reason. Smells good tho
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t exfoliate enough
customer_reviews.text: This is very similar to a lip balm or a vaseline feel. This is not a scrub whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Madre

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. I can’t have cane sugar and this is made with honey so it’s perfect for me. Not too harsh and lips are soft after. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: blueoleander

customer_reviews.title: Lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: Works great as long as you use it every couple days. Helps get hard skin off your lips
customer_reviews.author: Keri A Evans

customer_reviews.title: Nice but maybe not worth buying again
customer_reviews.text: Nice but I'd have to say it's the same effect as the lip balm. I get much better results from Korean lipcare masks
customer_reviews.author: ReviewP

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: You need only apply very little with your finger because the body warmth liquified it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss T

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Wonderful on my lips! Love the results! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Monet

customer_reviews.title: The Best in My Opinion
customer_reviews.text: After complicated open-heart surgery requiring extensive intubation, this product was the only one that helped with dry, severely cracked lips. Tried many others, had to order this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes lips soft
customer_reviews.text: My lips get very dry due to having problems with dry mouth. This makes my lips soft and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of small for the price but it works great. I would totally buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lip exfoliation product. After reading reviews I tried Burt’s Bees and LOVE it! I also bought the lip moisturizer and it’s pretty amazing as well. Highly recommend both!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this brand, the lip scrub is amazing and tastes and smells yummy! (Dont ingest lol) but it works wonders!!
customer_reviews.author: CrazyVix

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, put on every night before bed. Super moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Great for really dry weather
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a dry winter and it has helped a ton!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: it's okay. Not worth the hype. It really isn't that great.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not really a scrub
customer_reviews.text: Love how soft it leaves my lips feeling. Only thing I didn’t like about this is that almost immediately after applying the sugar/honey clumps up and doesn’t really scrub the way I’d like.but it’s very moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: Genesis V

customer_reviews.title: Comes off fast
customer_reviews.text: No scent and comes off fast but feels great when it’s on
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Makes my lips soft and smoochable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love hurts bees. I've tried pretty much most of the thier products and they never cease to amaze me. This lip mask is the best! Makes my lips super soft, and smoochable! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Dianne Nibarger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing exfoliater/hydrator ever. I can’t believe it took me this long to discover it.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Girl

customer_reviews.title: Worked in two days!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. I’ve always had chapped lips, even in the summer when it’s much less common. After using this lip balm for two nights, I have no more dead flaky skin on my lips and they aren’t cracked and bleeding anymore. I’m completely sold on this and recommend it to anyone who struggles with dry cracked lips all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: tastes horrible
customer_reviews.text: idk if it even works it just tastes so bad
customer_reviews.author: Hails

customer_reviews.title: Lip moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Seems to keep lips more moist than other products longer.
customer_reviews.author: virginia m. giuffre

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job getting rid of dead dry lip skin. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lorene

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It works and doesn't taste horrible. My lips are big and very sensitive. This fixed my dry lip problem I have in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING product. Smooth soft lips.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product, I have chapped lips all the time and as soon as I applied this all my dry skin went away leaving my lips soft and smooth. I had to apply two layers for all my dry skin to come off but I believe it is because I haven’t moisturized my lips in a couple weeks. My lips have never felt better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 3-4 times now and right after I apply it to my lips it seems to help moisturize them at first, but after a few hours or a day later they are back to being cracked. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: It didnt help improve my lips condition at all. It did however taste great lol
customer_reviews.author: Hectic Hooligan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best lip care product I have. Love it
customer_reviews.author: TomaCode

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Not this one.
customer_reviews.text: I love Burts Bees stuff. But this not so much. I ended up getting MAC lip scrub. Works great way better at getting the dead skin off of lips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonnn

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: Burt's Bees products are natural and one of the reason I love them. This was the first time trying this product. After just a few nights I can see a difference how soft and smooth my lips are.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff feels like butter!! Is so smooth and long lasting. Love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McGill

customer_reviews.title: Super rad!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great night time (or anytime) lip balm that is super moisturizing, penetrates deep, and makes my lips feel great. It’s thick but that’s what I like for overnight lip hydration.
customer_reviews.author: Maja Fredrique

product_meta.title: Burt’s Bees 100% Natural Overnight Intensive Lip Treatment, Ultra-Conditioning Lip Care - 0.25 ounce
product_meta.description: Style Name:Overnight TreatmentBurt’s Bees™ Overnight Intensive Lip Treatment provides long lasting moisturization for soft, smooth, healthy looking lips. Shield your lips from dryness while hydrating when you sleep with this intense lip moisturizer treatment. The 100% natural Ceramide are oils found naturally in your skin and are necessary for maintaining your skin’s barrier that protects from dryness and environmental irritants. Our overnight treatment with Ceramides helps support your skin’s barrier and retain moisture for soft, smooth and healthy looking lips. Pamper yourself with this Overnight Intensive Lip Treatment that soothes and conditions while you sleep. Wake up to healthier looking, kissably soft lips that are ready for the even application of lip color or lip balm. Burt’s Bees™ Conditioning Lip Scrub and the Overnight Intensive Lip Treatment work together to form a lip care beauty routine that reconditions your pout and changes your lipstick game. Give yourself a 100% natural, beautiful smile with this ultra-conditioning at home spa experience.
feature_bullets: One 0.25 ounce of Overnight Intensive Lip Treatment that moisturizes, conditions, smoothes and helps repair your lips natural moisture barrier while you sleep,

100% natural lip care, the Ceramide are oils found naturally in your skin and are necessary for maintaining your skin’s barrier that protects from dryness and environmental irritants so that you can wake up to soft, beautifully smooth and healthy looking lips,
Intense overnight lip treatment acts as a lip moisturizer and soothes, conditions and forms a protective layer to help restore moisture to the lips (,
Hydrate, condition and reduce fine lines on and around your lips while you sleep and wake up to lips that are ready for an even application of lip color or lip balm,
Give yourself an at home spa experience with Burt’s Bees Conditioning Lip Scrub followed by Burt’s Bees Overnight Intensive Lip Treatment formulated give you a naturally beautiful pout
